DOC.brief_summary: Among health problem peri-menopausal woman , sleep disturbance common complaint . The aim study realize body constitution peri-menopausal woman sleep disturbance ; evaluate effect Duo-in practice population see intervention decrease dosage hormone replacement therapy . Quasi-experimental design convenient sample adopt . Participants recruit China Medical University , Tri-Service General Hospital , Taiwan Society Health Promotion , Dr. Chen 's Obstetrics Gynecology Clinic . One hundred participant willing try Duo-in exercise improve sleep quality randomly assign experiment group control group . The experiment group practice Duo-in exercise 20 minute every day 2 month ; intervention control group . Then , 2 week , participant experiment control group crossover . The experiment group intervention , control group practice Duo-in exercise 2 month . Chinese version Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( CPSQI ) , Body Constitution Questionnaire ( BCQ ) , peri-menopausal disturbance scale , peri-menopausal fatigue scale use assessment time point . According previous experience , total 70 participant complete whole observation course . Generalized estimate equation ( GEE ) apply analyze repeated measurement different time group . This study provide evidence Duo-in exercise complementary treatment hormone replacement therapy peri-menopausal woman , also integration Dao-in exercise mainstream treatment patient sleep disturbance .
